channel.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
channel.description:
Hello! Having the same problem as TS in https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,743.msg5569.html#msg5569
have also done what he did
You have asked TS: "Does the VPN work with a non-socksified-by-default browser such as iceweasel?"
So if it does? what should i do?
[b]Problem[/b]: [u]VPN installed on workstation seems to work only in iceweasel properly. Torbrowser shows to use Tor.[/u] used vpnbook.com settings to openvpn (https://www.vpnbook.com/howto/setup-openvpn-on-ubuntu)
Will be very grateful for your answer, have read all your website, including this forum, have reinstalled both Wms, nothing helps. Could you be so kind to give a piece of advice,pls?

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: MaDwarf
item.description:
Thank you for your answer, Patrick!

Read full topic

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The closest translation I know is “use no proxy” (but in Whonix, everything from the workstation must go through Tor one way or another anyhow). There is one related issue with it:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Tor Browser Basics

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

Read full topic

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: MaDwarf
item.description:
Does Transparent Torification in Tor mean, that it behaves ike any other browser, exceptsecurity limitations (like Noproxy, etc)?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: MaDwarf
item.description:
Tor Button’s -> Preferences to set it to any other proxy or no proxy. Transparent Torification means, “no proxy” or in other words it means “use whatever the system provides”.
worked perfectly!
rtfm rules!
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you read this chapter https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnel_Proxy_or_SSH_or_VPN_through_Tor#Using_TransPort_instead_of_SocksPort_is_required_for_Tor_-.3E_VPN which links to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Change.2FRemove_Proxy_Settings ?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem for user->TOR->VPN part 2
item.dc:creator: MaDwarf
item.description:
Hello! Having the same problem as TS in https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,743.msg5569.html#msg5569

have also done what he did

You have asked TS: “Does the VPN work with a non-socksified-by-default browser such as iceweasel?”

So if it does? what should i do?

Problem: VPN installed on workstation seems to work only in iceweasel properly.
Torbrowser shows to use Tor.
used vpnbook.com settings to openvpn (https://www.vpnbook.com/howto/setup-openvpn-on-ubuntu)

Will be very grateful for your answer, have read all your website, including this forum, have reinstalled both Wms, nothing helps.
Could you be so kind to give a piece of advice,pls?

Read full topic
